---
permalink: /manual/monuments
title: "Monuments"
sidebar:
  title: "Manual"
  nav: manual
---

Monuments are buildings that take time, resources and workers depending on their current stage of construction.
They are supplied by the [Worker System]({% link _pages/manual/systems/people.md %}) and, unlike other worker users, provide the workers with a path to their respective work places inside the site when they arrive.

<div class="mxgraph" style="" data-mxgraph="{&quot;highlight&quot;:&quot;#0000ff&quot;,&quot;lightbox&quot;:false,&quot;nav&quot;:true,&quot;edit&quot;:&quot;_blank&quot;,&quot;xml&quot;:&quot;&lt;mxfile host=\&quot;app.diagrams.net\&quot; modified=\&quot;2021-01-16T06:49:50.874Z\&quot; agent=\&quot;5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/87.0.4280.141 Safari/537.36\&quot; etag=\&quot;pzN2sMk5I9L8OTp_3iXc\&quot; version=\&quot;14.2.3\&quot; type=\&quot;google\&quot;&gt;&lt;diagram id=\&quot;XObRFSexSG4tRmZW6AYT\&quot; name=\&quot;Monument\&quot;&gt;&lt;/diagram&gt;&lt;/mxfile&gt;&quot;}"></div>
<script type="text/javascript" src="https://viewer.diagrams.net/js/viewer-static.min.js"></script>

The created building does not necessarily have to be a monument, monument sites can be used for any building that needs time and resources to be built instead of being instantly plopped down.
